Short Answer Questions (Give one liner answers only)

Name two communication tools mentioned in the passage.
CorrectAnswer: Any Pair is Correct: : Zoom and Slack, Zoom and Microsoft Teams, Slack and Microsoft Teams

Question:
Short Answer Questions (Give one liner answers only)

According to the passage, what is one challenge remote workers face regarding their personal lives?
CorrectAnswer: They may struggle to separate their work and personal lives, which can lead to burnout.

Question:
Short Answer Questions (Give one liner answers only)

What is one financial benefit companies experience by allowing remote work?
CorrectAnswer: They can reduce office space and lower rental costs.

Marking Criteria:
Task Achievement (3 marks): How well you respond to all parts of the task and provide clear, relevant information.
Coherence and Cohesion (2 marks): How logically your ideas are organized and connected.
